name: Heartspawn
description:
A platformer prototype surround the concept of sacrifice. Throw your own heart, and fall in a pit so you can respawn back where your heart is.

Controls:

WASD - Move Player
Left Mouse Button - Throw Heart

This prototype was developed for the Untitled Game Jam #33 under the theme Sacrifice. All assets are original.

We are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!
